name: Mino (peachygeck, Joey, pyrusdude, Fracta Mundi)
description:
Use your grappling hook and newfound gravity powers to save the forest from further destruction! 

Controls (Keyboard / Xbox Gamepad)

  • Move: WASD / Joystick
  • Jump: Spacebar / A
  • Sprint: Shift / Left Shoulder
  • Grapple: E / Y
  • Swap Gravity: Left Click / X
  • Reset Gravity: Right Click / B

Humans

  • Rat Dev
  • Pyrusdude
  • Peachygeck
  • Mahosuki
  • Fracta Mundi

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio, Komiku (FreePD.com), Rafael Krux (FreePD.com)

Known bugs: 

  • Trying to grapple across the stream with the downed tree, before pulling the log down from the cliff can sometimes result in an infinite death loop. 
  • If gravity swap doesn't register, try resetting gravity first by right clicking.
